name: Yumi Takuma
title: Tonkatsu
instructions: Season pork cutlets with salt and pepper. Coat with flour, then dip in beaten egg, then panko breadcrumbs. Deep-fry at 180°C until golden brown on both sides. Serve with shredded cabbage and tonkatsu sauce.

name: Minho Lee
title: Bibimbap
instructions: Cook rice and prepare assorted vegetables like spinach, bean sprouts, carrots, and mushrooms. Sauté each with sesame oil and garlic. Serve rice in a bowl with toppings, gochujang, and a fried egg. Mix before eating.
